1467580.name: GENIUS AT WORK!
1467580.description:
Experiment, imagine, create...
Test your intelligence and creativity! Let your imagination fly and carry out your technical projects.
Genius At Work! is a building game.
Experiment with the different pieces that you have at your disposal so that you understand what each one does. There is no limit to the number of units of each piece that you can use.

Game modes
The GUIDED CONSTRUCTION mode is recommended to start with. You will build the proposed projects while you learn.
In FREE CONSTRUCTION mode you can create the number of projects you want and the number of construction pieces is unlimited.

Pieces set
The set of pieces is divided into three parts identified by colors:
ORANGE for structural blocks and others.
BLUE for electrical pieces.
YELLOW for mechanical pieces.
You have more than 60 pieces available.


LET'S BUILD!
1467580.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
